oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1946-08-10 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Aired performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on August 10, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Little Willie; Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Ann Bond; Prairie Songbirds; Dick Reinhart; Hiram Higsby
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening statements & theme / (1:12) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke and introduce the show / (1:46) Little Willie [phonetic], Chuck Davis, and the Roundup Boys perform "Steel Guitar Rag" / (3:20) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke then introduce Ann Bond / (4:38) Ann Bond performs "Blue Ridge Mountain Blues" / (6:16) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:50) The Prairie Songbirds perform "The Alpine Yodeler" / (6:25) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (9:21) Dick Reinhart performs "Cattle Call" / (11:40) Hiram and Ann Bond tell a joke through a skit / (12:55) Hiram Higsby and Ann Bond perform "Harinktum" [phonetic] [unconfirmed] / (15:07) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins tell a joke [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Bond, Ann; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick;
